body:
Comment 5 by **tyler@stretchr.com**: 
It seems the best approach would be to inform the user that the old directory needs to
be deleted before installation can continue, thus giving them a chance to make a backup
of anything they'd like prior to the installation continuing.

However, I can't really think of a situation in which the user would have anything in
the installation path other than what was put there by a previous installer, so maybe we
could simply remove it without prompting.

Thoughts?
